name: Gistify
tagline: A utility to add gist creation to finder on mac.
body:
### Check out Gistify
Gistify is a simple utility to post gists from text files in finder. This makes it super easy to upload some text permenantly. [Here](https://gist.github.com/anonymous/5105183) is an example of a Gistified text file.
If you want to use it, just Download the source and put the service into your 
```
/Users/Username/Library/Services
```
directory. If that fails, you can try importing through automator or just paste the source into an automator shell script with the following settings:
````
Service receives selected files or folders in finder

pass input as arguments
```
### TODO:
There's much to be improved on this! For one, it would be nice to have the ability to post with auth instead of anonymous, and currently automator has a bug which prevents me from using the file name from sys.argv as the file name in the json.
